general/popular/everywhere/universal
see 洱海[Er3 hai3]
Pu'er tea from the Pu'er region of Yunnan
Pu'er prefecture level city in Yunnan/county capital of Ning'er Hani and Yi autonomous county 寧洱哈尼族彞族自治縣|宁洱哈尼族彝族自治县
former Pu'er Hani and Yi autonomous county in Yunnan, renamed in 2007 Ning'er Hani and Yi autonomous county 寧洱哈尼族彞族自治縣|宁洱哈尼族彝族自治县, capital Pu'er city 普洱市
pinyin: Pu3 er3 Ha1 ni2 zu2 Yi2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4
containing_words.word: 普洱哈尼族彝族自治县

sentences.english: The paper puts emphasis on the corners mechanism in puer tea market.
sentences.chinese: 文章重点对普洱茶市中的逼仓机理进行了分析。

sentences.english: The Sakhnin fans will say it was a plastic bullet.
sentences.chinese: 萨克宁哈普洱队的球迷会说这是一个橡皮子弹所为。

sentences.english: What kind of environment is preferable?
sentences.chinese: 普洱茶适宜存放怎样的环境下呢？

sentences.english: " Pu'er City, was the "Tea Horse Road" on the importance Inn.
sentences.chinese: 普洱市曾是“茶马古道”上的重要的驿站。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the Illustrated Book of Pu Er Area collected at Yunnan Museum.
sentences.chinese: 介绍云南博物馆绘画藏品《普洱府图说》。

sentences.english: The strategy of marketing of Puer Tea culture was discussed according to Chinese tea culture.
sentences.chinese: 结合中国的传统茶文化，探讨普洱茶的文化营销战略。

sentences.english: There are tea collectors who always look for vintage Pu-erh made by famous factory.
sentences.chinese: 收藏人士总是热衷于寻找大厂制作的年份普洱。

sentences.english: Prized vintages from the 19th century have sold for thousands of dollars a wedge.
sentences.chinese: 19世纪的上品普洱茶可以卖到每块成千上万美金。

sentences.english: Zhongheng, director of the Pu’er City Experiment Demo Coffee Farm.
sentences.chinese: 他本人是普洱市咖啡实验示范农场的主任。

sentences.english: Early in the Tang Dynasty, tea trade between Pu'er and other areas already began.
sentences.chinese: 早在唐代，茶普洱之间的贸易和其他领域已经开始。

sentences.english: Both of them were found to be the new characteristic principles of Pu-Er ripe tea.
sentences.chinese: 二者均为新发现的普洱熟茶的特征性成分。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a soybean-Pu-erh cooked tea and the preparation method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种大豆普洱熟茶及其制备方法。

sentences.english: Some Pu-erh cost even more than USD1000 per piece.
sentences.chinese: 一些普洱的价格甚至在1000美金每饼以上。

sentences.english: This is perhaps the ultimate similarity between the Pu'er tea and Buddhist doctrine.
sentences.chinese: 这也许是普洱茶与佛法最根本相通之处。

sentences.english: Hey, you thought Pu'er tea is produced in Pu'er?
sentences.chinese: 嗨，叫普洱茶就是普洱产的呀？

sentences.english: Hey, you thought Pu'er tea is produced in Pu'er?
sentences.chinese: 嗨，叫普洱茶就是普洱产的呀？

tea/tea plant/CL:杯[bei1],壺|壶[hu2]
a cake of tea, commonly Pu'er tea 普洱茶[Pu3 er3 cha2], compacted into a bowl or nest shape/dome shaped tea-brick/caked tea
black tea/CL:杯[bei1],壺|壶[hu2]
Simao city in Yunnan, renamed Pu'er city 普洱市 in 2007
